title: Consent
text: two ways collect user consent initialise tracking: Use one provided UI functions prompt user consent Build something custom

title: Consent
text: Pre-built prompts place UI, use depends style preference Bootstrap version. trackingToastBS5() - Bootstrap 5 notification trackingModalBS5() - Bootstrap 5 modal trackingModalBS4() - Bootstrap 4 modal trackingModalBS3() - Bootstrap 3 modal
code: library(shiny) library(shinymetrics)  tracker <- Shinymetrics$new()$track_recommended()  ui <- fluidPage(   theme = bslib::bs_theme(version = 5L),   tracker$include(),   trackingToastBS5(     full_width = TRUE,     background = "white",     position = "bottom"   ),   div(     style = "min-height:100vh;",     h1("Prompt V5")   ) )   server <- function(input, output, session) {   shinymetrics_server() }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: Consent
text: Alternatively can course create custom prompt choosing.
code: library(shiny) library(shinymetrics)  tracker <- Shinymetrics$new()$track_recommended()  ui <- fluidPage(   tracker$include() )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   shinymetrics_server()    observe({     showModal(       modalDialog(         title = "Tracking",         actionButton("accept", "Accept"),         actionButton("reject", "Reject")       )      )   })    observeEvent(input$accept, {     removeModal()     shinymetrics_enable()   })    observeEvent(input$reject, {     removeModal()     shinymetrics_disable()   }) }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: Get Started
text: Create free account shinymetrics, require enter credit card information.  creating account please check inbox email coming hello@shinymetrics.com activation link.

title: Get Started
text: account created activated able login register first application. Login visit ‚ÄúApps‚Äù (top right) click ‚ÄúRegister app‚Äù button fill form adequately.

title: Get Started
text: app registered appear main dashboard. Click  icon obtain tracking code.

title: Get Started
text: Follow instructions page implement tracking application. responsible obtaining consent users tracking. default, shinymetrics R package track anything. See documentation consent information.

title: Tracking
text: track_input track_output methods fire events every time input, e.g.: textInput used, every time output, e.g.: plotOutput rendered, respectively.

title: Tracking
text: track errors, error message, occur.

title: Tracking
text: track file downloads downloadHandler(). store downloaded file, track name.

title: Tracking
text: Track page views: fires event every visit.

title: Tracking
text: Tracks server computing something computations done server goes back idle. E.g.: application provides button triggers run model, application displays results model plot table. user clicks button spins model server-side: ‚Äúbusy‚Äù event fires. plot table sent server front-end server done ‚Äúidle‚Äù event fires.

title: User Management
text: user visits application first time assigned random user id stored cookie, ID always starts smu_ able see dashboards. However, can also set user , e.g.: application requires authentication runs environment user already authenticated (e.g.: Posit Connect). Note , like default username created shinymetrics, also stored cookie need set user every session. using Posit Connect able access authenticated user session object session$user.
code: library(shiny) library(shinymetrics)  tracker <- Shinymetrics$new()$track_recommended()  ui <- fluidPage(   tracker$include(),   textInput("username"),   actionButton("login", "Log in") )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   shinymetrics_server()    observeEvent(input$login, {     shinymetrics_set_user(input$username)   }) }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: User Management
text: can always remove user tracking shinymetrics_unset_user. remove current user cookie set back anonymous user (ID starting smu_).

title: Track Shiny Applications
text: R package track shiny applications shinymetrics. üöß shinymetrics currently closed alpha. Get Started Main site

title: Track Shiny Applications
text: can install development version shinymetrics GitHub :

title: Track Shiny Applications
text: ‚ö†Ô∏è package comes prompts help developers collect consent users enable disable tracking. prompts toggle tracking cookies store consent, required must implemented .

title: Track Shiny Applications
text: Place token registered application .Renviron (elsewhere environment variable) SHINYMETRICS_TOKEN. Create tracker Shinymetrics class Include tracker UI (Optional recommended) include server-side function shinymetrics_server() useful information need request consent initialise tracking. See vignettes appropriate methods.
code: library(shiny) library(shinymetrics)  # initialise the tracker tracker <- Shinymetrics$new()$track_recommended()  ui <- fluidPage(   tracker$include() # include in the UI )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   shinymetrics_server() # (optional) print information on tracking }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: Shinymetrics Custom Event ‚Äî shinymetrics_custom_event
text: work standard events. Standard events: connected disconnected disconnected sessioninitialised busy idle input output message conditional bound unbound error outputinvalidated recalculating recalculated visualchange updateinput pageview filedownload must custom events choosing, e.g.: custom event registering logging user.

title: Assertions ‚Äî xor
text: Assertions
